import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import logo from "../../../Healistry.png" import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' // import Button from '@restart/ui/esm/Button'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import './add.css'; import axios from "axios"; function Doctors_update() { // const[name,setName]=useState(''); // const[locatin,setLocation]=useState(''); // const[contact,setContact]=useState(''); // const[warddetails,setWarddetails]=useState(''); // const[staffcount,setStaffcount]=useState(''); // const[image,setImage]=useState(''); const[hospital,setHospital]=useState([]); const getRequest = () => { axios .get('http://localhost:4000/hospital') .then(response => { setHospital(response.data); }); } useEffect(() => { getRequest() }, [hospital]); function deleteHospital(_id) { alert("Are you confirm to delete?"); fetch(`http://localhost:4000/hospital/${_id}`, { method: 'DELETE' }).then((response) => { response.json(); alert("Your Date Successfully Deleted...!"); }) } function edit_Hospital(_id){ console.log(_id); window.sessionStorage.setItem("HospitalID", _id); window.location='/editHospital' } return (
